msItem.title: Sermones de sanctis
msItem.note: Schneyer III.246â€“266 (not listing this manuscript). Fols. 1r-96v present a selection of sermons, with some additional matter not listed by Schneyer; from fol. 97r onwards, where there is a change of scribe, almost the complete collection listed by Schneyer is included (lacking only some Michaelmas sermons), with a few additional items. The sermons in this section are also intermittently given marginal numbers, beginning with the sermon for the Invention of Stephen ('CCiiij').
The text of fols. 1r-96v has been extensively corrected, perhaps at least in part by one of the scribes of fols. 97r-264v.
The additional sermons are listed separately below.

msItem.incipit: Ascendam in palmam In quibus verbis duo tanguntur, videlicet contemplacionis modus et eius fructus
Cum esset desponsata mater Hic circa beatam virginem possimus notare tria, primum est eius admirabilis humilitas
Orate pro invicem Volens fideles inducere in ecclesia ad orandum isto tempore
msItem.note: Not listed in Schneyer; pr. in the editions of c. 1478 (ISTC ij00187000), 1484 (ISTC ij00187000) etc.

msItem.incipit: Apparuerunt illis dispertite lingwe tamquam ignis Adueniens hodie spiritus sanctus christi iesu in discipulos
msItem.explicit: fervor vere caritatis in nobis accendatur prestante domino iesu christo amen

msItem.incipit: Ivstorum anime Magna consolacio est viris sanctis quando habent securitatem quod sint in statum gracie
msItem.explicit: tunc dicere poterit Ps. Cor meum etc.
msItem.note: Not listed in Schneyer; printed (alius de sanctis) in the edition of 1484 (ISTC ij00190000), fols. l recto - li recto.

msItem.incipit: Fecit deus duo luminaria magna etc. Sicud dicit Augustinus ij libro super Genesim ad litteram, Quod luminis nomine
msItem.explicit: istis ergo luminaribus nos conlucere faceat lux increata filius dei viui qui est

msItem.incipit: Segregate michi barnabam et saulus Tria sunt necessaria predicatori, scilicet bona eloquencia siue suauis, ut auditores trahere possit ad dei amorem Secundo sauatsana doctrina, Tercia bona uita, ideo non dixit spiritus sanctus in officium sed in opus
msItem.explicit: Et usque ad mortem perseueranter pro christo certare
msItem.note: Not listed in Schneyer; largely as printed in the edition of 1484 (ISTC ij00190000), fols. xlix recto - li recto.

msItem.incipit: Letabitur deserta Ista verba conuenienter adaptari possunt beate marie magdalene quia ante conuersionem suam fuit desertum
msItem.explicit: Compleuit in ea illud Surge aquilo et veni auster etc.

msItem.incipit: Sancta et salubriter est cogitacio Viuentes circa mortuos tria habere debent, primo de morte sepe cogitare
msItem.note: Not listed in Schneyer; printed in the editions of c. 1478 and later.
